column4: So, I just discovered that my router might not be compatible with Ubuntu. Has anyone else had this problem?
Hmm. Let me look at the page I was looking at, to see if I can explain it better.
how is your router connected? usb or ethernet?
what is your local IP? check with /sbin/ifconfig
ipconfig.
it's a windows command, so yes it will
ipconfig | more
#ubuntu+1. youre OT here
off topic
don't bother about other people, bother about your own problem and do what I told you
I asked you something
and I told you how to slow it down
then do what I asked you
you use intrepid?
what are you running? right now?
last chance. run the command I told you about
in ubuntu: ifconfig -a
what ethernet chip?
That's a new one. Let me look into that. Lol.
I asked you lots of things which you all ignored
I didn't ignore it. I replied, you confused me with someone else.
it's nice how you ignored my question again. I think I will ignore you too frm now on. HAND

: again, I wasn't ignoring you. Take it as a personal insult if you want, but it's not. I'm trying to answer the questions that I'm asked from people that are trying to help me, just like you are. I appreciate the effort, but I can't answer fifty people at once, and still try to answer the questions fully.
